metadata.name: Steampunk
metadata.description:
Steampunk is an artwork that takes the viewer on a journey through the evolution of a steampunk treehouse in a forest. 

The treehouse is a architectural masterpiece in the second empire style with huge windows. 

The series of continuous shots in the artwork captures the treehouse at different stages of its evolution, with each frame shot during the golden hour and in chiaroscuro style. The use of golden hour and chiaroscuro lighting adds a level of realism to the artwork, making it feel as if the viewer is peeking into a real-life, secret world. 

The steampunk aesthetic of the treehouse, combined with the lush forest setting, creates a sense of mystery and wonder. 

As the GIF plays, the viewer can see the treehouse change and evolve before their eyes, as if they are literally traveling through time. The animation adds an extra layer of movement and life to the piece, making it a truly unique and captivating artwork.

Total Frames: 300
